size() - Method in class data.Event
The method size() returns the length of the array with the values of the random variables.
SwingApplication - Class in gui
The class SwingApplication extends JFrame and it's the "front-page" of our GUI.
SwingApplication() - Constructor for class gui.SwingApplication
Besides initializing the necessary fields and attributes, this constructor defines all the actions for the several JButtons through the callback mechanism addActionListener.
